title: Fort Worth toddler shoots himself in the arm with his mother's gun
content:
Updated at 3:52 p.m.: Revised to include boy's condition.
Fort Worth police say a toddler accidentally shot himself in the arm Monday morning.
According to police records, a woman in the 1400 block of Meadowlane Terrace, near Ederville Road, called 911 just after 11:30 a.m. and reported that her 3-year-old had shot himself.
0:00
/
0:50
Menu
The woman told the dispatcher that she keeps the gun for her personal protection.
The boy was hospitalized in good condition.
A police spokeswoman, Officer Tamara Valle, told the Fort Worth Star-Telegram that authorities were investigating but no charges were expected.
